remarks: Convert an operation commutative law to class notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jun-2013.)
statement:
caovcomg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x F y ) = ( y F x ) ) $.
caovcomg $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) ) -> ( A F B ) = ( B F A ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
